website_summaries.verdict: A good value for its price, this is a smaller unit that operates quietly and efficiently.
pros: A good size for smaller spaces or extra areas like garages, it stands out for being affordable, quiet, cooling sufficiently and having a good storage capacity
The unit holds up well even after years of use
cons: Occasional issues with leaking, and some don't like that this design lacks a door handle

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent internal temperature and ICE BUILDUP
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the refrigerator completely froze within one day, when we thawed it out it refroze. Turning down the temp did not help. We received an email back from customer service that gave us suggestions to adjust the temperature and make sure it was not pushed against the wall. Our next several emails, after having another wall full of ice on the inside of the fridge, have yet to be answered. The inside of the refrigerator does not keep a consistent temperature. We definitely do not suggest this refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took forever to arrive
customer_reviews.text: I neeeeded my fridge and I was 30 minutes away from it for over a week. It made it across country less than a week yet sat in a warehouse over a week 30 minutes away with no one to be able to talk to to make arrangements to get it sooner. Beyond frustrated with that alone. So far no issues with unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer White-Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge!
customer_reviews.text: We decided to split the baby as it were and have a 11 cu ft fridge with no freezer plus a stand alone 8.1 cu freezer. Turns out there is no way to efficiently insulate for a combination fridge/freezer!!!! our separate units us less energy than any smaller combination we could find. This Danby is perfect and well laid out.
customer_reviews.author: L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Upon bringing it into the kitchen and removing the box I was very disappointed to find a sizeable dent on the right side ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally moved the fridge from my garage into my home. It had been in my garage still on the pallet and boxed since delivery. Upon bringing it into the kitchen and removing the box I was very disappointed to find a sizeable dent on the right side - which, unfortunately, is the side that will show. Other than that, I am pleased with this small refrigerator. It is surprisingly roomy as it is a fridge only - no freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Fields Jones

customer_reviews.title: Dented refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator was delivered with a dent on the side. Before I placed the order; I was reading reviews of the refrigerator delivered with dents , but I ordered it anyway! It was delivered dented to me! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact size, great for extra food!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect refrigerator for our needs and fits perfectly in our laundry room. We need it for overflow food from our big shopping trips, stocking up during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Miulli

customer_reviews.title: Delivery restrictions
customer_reviews.text: The product had to be picked up in the next town as the semi could not deliver to our road because of a weight restriction. This would have been nice to know before hand. Also the box had been damaged, was torn as if something had punctured it. So far the product is functions fine. No evident damage has been noted.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Misleading labeling
customer_reviews.text: Was sold as Upright Freezer, but is only cheap made refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: Clarence J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item, and the seller was quick and efficient ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this refrigerator to be used as a bait refrigerator for nightcrawlers in a sporting goods store. It works perfectly and maximizes the space without having a freezer compartment that I would never use. Excellent item, and the seller was quick and efficient in processing and shipping it directly to the door of my store. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome delivery time, product was described perfectly, will shop again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezerless fridge
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It would have been nice if the delivery guy took away the packing material though.
customer_reviews.author: daveg

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect fridge to have as a basement or garage spare
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fridge to have as a basement or garage spare. There is a lot more room to it than I thought. Update: I have had this fridge now for over four years. It is located in my hot garage in Texas and it still works without any problems and keeps all the extra food we store without any problems. It has never frozen up and keeps working like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alan Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Broke in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: It is leaking water. Freezes cucumbers, but if I set the thermostat lower, then it's too warm. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Working as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The fridge sweats inside however ur doesn't appear to affect performance
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: did not last 3 years spent 500 $ to fix ...
customer_reviews.text: did not last 3 years spent 500 $ to fix it and then went out again one week after warranty on parts expired- never will i buy Danby products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend this refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT recommend this refrigerator. Our 90 year old Dad bought this model, and in less than 2 years, the thermostat has already gone out. It's going to cost him over $200 to replace the "defective" thermostat, per a Danby certified technician. Unfortunately, it is not something we can replace ourselves. Ironically, it is sitting next to a working 50 year old Kenmore freezer. Danby should make products that last longer and not have customers replacing major parts within 2 years of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Danby DAR110A1WDD 11 Cu. Ft. All Refrigerator - White
product_meta.description: Enjoy your chilled beverages where they're needed most with the Danby 11 Cubic Feet Spotless Compact Apartment Refrigerator. This handy compact fridge is perfect for an office, garage, dorm room, basement, or any other room you need to keep beverages and food cold and within reach. It has 11 cubic-foot capacity and is Evergy Star rated and compliant. It features a stylish and clean white color along with automatic defrost, two tempered glass shelves, a CanStor beverage dispenser, vegetable crisper and cover, and mechanical thermostat. It also features an interior light for grabbing a late-night snack or drink. This premium refrigerator measures 24 inches wide, 26 inches long, 58.75 inches high, and weighs 142.20 pounds.
feature_bullets: 11 CUBIC FEET: 11 cubic-feet capacity compact all fridge
4 SHELVES: 4 full width and 1.5-inch wide tempered glass shelves for maximum storage versatility

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars58 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
